resources.string:
1. Collect information
We collect personal information from users when they register or submit information through our application.
Personal information may include name, email address, phone number and address.

2. Use information
We use personal information collected to respond to user requests , providing services and communicating with users regarding matters related to our application or other services we provide.

3. Information security
We take appropriate security measures to protect personal information users against unauthorized access, loss or unwanted disclosure. However, no method of communication over the Internet or method of electronic storage is completely secure.

4. Share information
We do not sell, exchange or share personal information of users with third parties unless otherwise expressly agreed of the user or as required by law.

5. Cookie
We may use cookies to improve user experience. Users can refuse cookies or set alerts when cookies are sent. However, refusing cookies may limit some of the app features.

6. Policy changes
We reserve the right to update or change this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be notified on the application and take effect immediately.

7. Contact
If you have any questions or requests about our Privacy Policy, please contact us.
